title: Green flight paths: a catalyst for net-zero aviation by 2050
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02472A, Perspective
Open Access

Steve Griffiths, Joao M. Uratani, Alejandro Ríos-Galván, John M. Andresen, M. Mercedes Maroto-Valer
Large-scale sustainable aviation fuel (SAF) production and use is essential to achieving net-zero aviation by 2050.
